description.en:
In this world, there is: Confucianism; Taoism; Buddhism, Demons, and Magicians. Xu Qi’an, a graduate from the police academy, suddenly finds himself waking up in prison, to be exiled to the border three days later …

His initial goal was to protect himself in this world with no laws, and to be able to live a leisurely life as a rich man..

Many years later, Xu Qi’an looks back on the past, and the long-dead enemies and friends, as well as the numerous bones he has left behind.

As the Yangtze River flows eastward, the waves wash away the heroes; right and wrong, success or failure will all turn into nothing but history. However, just like the sun’s rays gleaming over the towering mountains, after the sunset, a new sun will rise.

altTitles.ja: あの子の子ども

description.en:
"I think I might be pregnant."

Sachi, a high school girl, has a childhood sweetheart, Takara.
One day, feeling something wrong with her health, she buys a pregnancy test.
Using the test at a diner in a town far from home, she sees two lines that indicate a "positive" result...

- **Note: Won the 47th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for Shoujo in 2023.**

altTitles.ja: テロメア

description.en:
Two siblings are roaming a post-apocalyptic world destroyed by a zombie epidemic 10 years ago. For some reason these two kids aren't getting attacked by the zombies.


(Source: Manga Mogura RE)

title.en: Kimi wa Yakamashi Tojite yo Kuchi o!

altTitles.ja: 君は喧し閉じてよ口を！

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi ha Yakamashi Tojite yo Kuchi wo!

altTitles.en: You're Too Noisy, So Just Shut It Already!
You Talk Too Much, So Just Shut It Already!

altTitles.vi: Cậu Ồn Ào Quá, Im lặng Giùm Tớ Đi!

altTitles.ru: Ты слишком много говоришь, так что заткнись уже!

altTitles.tl: Ang Ingay Mo Kaya Manahimik Ka Na Lang!

description.en: Hīragi Tsukino was born deaf. When she transfers to a new school, she meets a talkative boy named Enomoto Taiyō. Tsukino is slightly taken aback by Taiyō, who talks to her without regard to the fact that she can't hear.
description.ja: 柊月乃は生まれつき耳が聞こえない。そんな彼女が転校先で出会ったのは、おしゃべりな男子・榎本太陽。聞こえないことなんかお構いなしにしゃべりかけてくる太陽に若干引き気味な月乃。
description.ru: Хиираги Цукино родилась глухой. Когда она переводится в новую школу, она встречает говорливого мальчика по имени Эномото Тайо. Цукино немного обескуражена тем, что Тайо разговаривает с ней, не заботясь о том, что она не может его слышать...
description.vi: Hiiragi Tsukino là một cô bạn bị khiếm thính bẩm sinh. Khi cậu ấy chuyển đến trường mới, cậu ấy gặp được một cậu bạn lắm mồm tên Enomoto Taiyo. Tại đây, Tsukino luôn bị xoay tròn bởi những câu chuyện xàm xí của Taiyo bất chấp việc cô không thể nghe được cậu ta nói gì.

title.en: Somehow, I Started Living With a NEET Otaku Kunoichi (Pre-Serialization)

altTitles.ja-ro: NEET de Otaku na Kunoichi to naze ka Dousei hajimemashita

altTitles.ja: ニートでオタクなくノ一となぜか同棲はじめました

altTitles.ru: Каким-то образом, но в моём доме поселилась куноичи-отаку

altTitles.en: Somehow, I Started Living With a NEET Otaku Kunoichi

altTitles.zh: 不知为何我和NEET且宅的女忍者开始了同居生活

description.en:
A man is the target of a kunoichi's mission, and a lot of blood was spilled for him to learn this.  
  
However, said kunoichi is taking some "liberties" with the mission… Or are those part of the mission too?  
  
Approved scanlation by [@kotatsu358](https://twitter.com/kotatsu358)
description.ru: Мужчина - цель миссии куноичи, и много крови было пролито, чтобы понять и принять это. Однако, оказалось, что куноичи берет на себя некоторые «вольности» с миссией... Или это тоже часть миссии?

description.en:
Choi Yeon was abandoned by her friends and family. Now a university student, she has started working as a private tutor for a son of a rich family in Seongbuk-dong to hide her poverty. By chance, while working there she met Ji Shinhyuk, the older brother of her student.

Shinhyuk, the real owner of the house, completely ignored Yeon as if she was a mere object. But one day, he began to call on Yeon to perform menial errands. Some days, he would be crude; others, disrespectful. He would provoke Yeon with his indecipherable expression. Despite that, Yeon began to foster a growing attraction toward Shinhyuk, and hoped she would eventually catch his eye...

---
**Official Raws**
[Ridibooks R15 ver.](https://ridibooks.com/books/3093001461)
[Ridibooks R19 ver.](https://ridibooks.com/books/3093001173)

altTitles.ja: くまみこ

description.en: In the deep regions of the Touhouku area, the comedic story of the miko of bears, 14-year-old Machi, and her childhood friend, the talking bear Natsu, takes place as Machi struggles to qualify for city-life with Natsu's assistance.

altTitles.ja: サタノファニ

description.en: A mysterious syndrome turns schoolgirls into homicidal monsters behind numerous atrocities in Japan. However, nothing is what it seems and when Chika Amagi is arrested for the brutal murder of five people, a journey into uncharted, troubled waters begins!
description.es: Un misterioso síndrome convierte a las colegialas en monstruos homicidas detrás de numerosas atrocidades en Japón. Sin embargo, nada es lo que parece y cuando Chika Amagi es arrestado por el brutal asesinato de cinco personas, ¡comienza un viaje a aguas desconocidas y turbulentas!
description.fr:
Au Japon, un mystérieux syndrome transforme les écolières d'un établissement en monstres sanguinaires, capables de tuer leurs semblables avec un sang-froid incroyable. Dans cette période de trouble, Chika Amagi, étudiante sans histoire, est arrêtée pour le meurtre terrible de cinq personnes…   


---
description.pt-br: Uma síndrome misteriosa torna jovens garotas em monstros homicidas por trás de diversas atrocidades no Japão. Entretanto, nada é o que parece quando Chika Amagai é presa pelo assassinato brutal de cinco pessoas e é levada a uma prisão em uma ilha para estas assassinas!

altTitles.en: The Duchess With an Empty Soul

altTitles.th: ใจว่างเปล่าของดัชเชส

altTitles.zh-hk: 公爵夫人的百變召喚術

altTitles.ja: かりそめの公爵夫人

description.en:
The naïve Yvona is ready to do anything for her amazing fiancé! Summon magical beasts and let him take the glory? Sure! Wreck her body for a powerful spell and die for him? Yes! Watch him secretly embrace her trusted cousin Tristan with passion and deride her openly? Oka— wait. What? Just then, Yvona dies... and wakes up a year in the past with a burdened heart. Armed with her knowledge, Yvona's ready to fight for herself. And hmm, maybe form an alliance with the coldhearted Duke of Azentine...

---
I died miserably on the day I found out the truth. The truth that my fiancé had a hidden lover, and it was my very own male cousin.

On the second morning, after my 20th birthday, a miracle happened. From that point on, I decided not to believe in love anymore. I want to have a relationship with no strings attached and without any superficial feelings such as love.

"Duke Agentine, will you marry me?"

This proposal was nothing more than a marriage to keep up appearances and without love involved.

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=53939289)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-soulless-duchess/)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Istri-Palsu-Duke/3280)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/24657)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%A7%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%8A%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%AA/23)

**Original Novel:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4386129), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/3170012735)

**Official Novel Translation:** [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/72805)
description.fr: Je suis morte misérablement, le jour où j’ai découvert la vérité. La vérité, c’est que mon fiancé avait un amant caché et c’était mon propre cousin. Le lendemain de mon 20e anniversaire, un miracle s’est produit. A partir de là, j’ai décidé de ne plus croire à l’amour. Je veux avoir une relation sans aucune condition et sans sentiments superficiels tels que l’amour. «Duke Agentine, voulez-vous m’épouser?» Cette proposition n’était rien de plus qu’un mariage pour garder les apparences et sans amour impliqué.
description.id:
Di hari kedua setelah ulang tahunku yang ke-20, sebuah keajaiban terjadi. Pada hari itu: aku mengetahui sebauh kenyataan: tunanganku memiliki selingkuhan, seorang sepupuku satu-satunya. Sejak itu, aku sudah tidak lagi percaya dengan yang namanya cinta, dan mati dengan mengenaskan.

Ketika aku terbangun, aku kembali ke masa lalu. Kali ini, aku hanya ingin memiliki hubungan tanpa adanya ikatan, dan tidak lain tidak bukan hanya karena sebuah kepentingan. Jadi, aku memberinya lamaran pernikahan, hanya untuk mencapai kepentingan bersama. "Duk Agentine, maukah kamu menikah denganku?"
description.mn: Үнэнийг олж мэдсэн тэр өдөр... Би өрөвдөлтэйгөөр нас барсан. Тэрхүү үнэн гэвэл намайг хэн бэ гэдгээр минь хардаг гэж санаж ирсэн сүйт залуу маань үеэлтэй маань янаг амрагийн холбоотой байсан гэх явдал. Би дэндүү харалган явж. Гэвч гайхамшиг биелэлээ олон, би жилийн өмнөхрүүгээ буцаж ирсэн. Энэ мөчөөс эхлэн би ахиж хайр гээч зүйлд итгэхгүй. Хэн нэгний хайрыг хүсч, түүний төлөө өөрийгөө золиослохгүй! Зөвхөн өөрийнхөө төлөө амьдрах болно!
description.pt-br: Eu morri miseravelmente, no dia em que descobri a verdade. A verdade é que meu noivo tinha um amante escondido e era meu primo.Na segunda manhã, depois do meu aniversário de 20 anos, aconteceu um milagre. A partir daí, decidi não acreditar mais no amor.Eu quero ter um relacionamento sem amarras e sem sentimentos superficiais, como o amor."Duquesa Agentine, quer se casar comigo?"Essa proposta nada mais era do que um casamento para manter as aparências e sem o amor envolvido.

description.en: A girl who was adopted by two mothers met her soulmate- another girl, when she was 16 years old. After dating for ten years, the 'soulmate' decided to marry a man at the age of 28 because she did not want to live an "abnormal life". Only after leaving her to marry a man, did she finally understand the true meaning of love during those countless days and nights. However, can they still go back to the way things were?

altTitles.ja: 帰ってきた元勇者

description.en:
Once, a hero has been summoned to a different world in order to defeat the demon king. After the war stretching 3 years ended, the commendable hero slayed the demon king. And he was forcibly deported back to earth after being dismissed.  
  
*"Give me a break!  
Elves in addition to beast race, dwarfs and demon race.  
Even though I wanted to make a harem in the different world I saved!  
My dream will not come true on earth, where there is no magic at all."*  
  
Thus, the hero returns on his own.  
Without the blunder of being extradited to earth this time, he will build a harem of his own in a different world.  
  


---
description.pt:
Uma vez, um herói foi convocado para um mundo diferente para derrotar o rei demônio. Depois da guerra que durou 3 anos, o herói louvável que matou o rei demônio, foi mandado à força de volta à Terra depois de ser dispensado.  
  
"Me dá um tempo!  
Elfos, além da raça de bestas, anões e demônios.  
Mesmo que eu quisesse fazer um harém no mundo diferente que salvei!  
Meu sonho não se tornará realidade na terra, onde não há mágica nenhuma. "  
  
Assim, o herói retorna por conta própria.  
Sem a asneira de ser extraditado para a Terra desta vez, ele construirá seu próprio harém em um mundo diferente..
description.pt-br: Uma vez, um herói foi convocado para um mundo diferente para derrotar o rei demônio. Depois da guerra que durou 3 anos, o herói louvável que matou o rei demônio, foi mandado à força de volta à Terra depois de ser dispensado. "Me dá um tempo! Elfos, além da raça de bestas, anões e demônios. Mesmo que eu quisesse fazer um harém no mundo diferente que salvei! Meu sonho não se tornará realidade na terra, onde não há mágica nenhuma". Assim, o herói retorna por conta própria. Sem a asneira de ser extraditado para a Terra desta vez, ele construirá seu próprio harém em um mundo diferente

altTitles.ja: 運命の巻戻士

description.en:
The world's most easy-to-understand and hot loop manga!

An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case! The first loop manga in CoroCoro's 45-year history, a must-see!

altTitles.en: Chronicles of the Martial God's Return

altTitles.ja: 武神帰還録

altTitles.es-la: Crónicas del Regreso del Dios marcial

description.en:
The worst talent that no one can compete with. Unstoppable Demon God, Dan Uhyeon.

A thousand years after being sealed for the misdeed. A thousand years was enough to get rid of Dan Uhyeon's sense of superiority. A world that has changed, solitude with no one knows, and the only thing left is despondency and emptiness.

"Time goes like the wind. There's really nothing left."

A little girl who appeared in front of Dan Uhyeon lost her purpose and will to live aimlessly, Hwa Somi. For a girl who seems to have nowhere to lean on, Dan Uhyeon feels the same and gradually begins to open the door of his mind.

"I'm Dan Uhyeon. Come with me."

The story of a warrior with an icy heart and acute and pure girl The story of an unusual family's life in the midfield will warm your heart.

---
The Ultimate Martial Divine Demon, Dan Woohyun, was sealed up because he was too strong for the world to handle.  After a millennium passed by, he was released from his seal and felt like everything was meaningless as he wandered the back alleys… 

Just as he fell down because he was sick of the world, a small hand appeared in front of him.

"What's this?" asked Dan Woohyun. 

"A dumpling!" came a reply. 

This was the first time in his life that someone had been nice to him without any impure intentions, and that changed his fate. This is the chronicle of a martial god who traversed through a thousand years of time and space!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98%EB%A1%9D/2891), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59492385)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16060)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112858)
description.fr: Le sixième chef-d’œuvre du genre Wuxia qui comblera vos attentes, tout comme les [Chroniques du retour du troisième degré], [La conquête de la faction céleste] et les [Chroniques des sept dragons et des sept démons]. [Chroniques du retour du Dieu Martial] Le Démon Martial Divin Ultime, Dan Woohyun, a été enfermé car il était trop fort pour que le monde puisse le gérer. Après un millénaire, il a été libéré de son sceau et avait l’impression que tout n’avait pas de sens alors qu’il errait dans les ruelles… Au moment où il s’est écroulé parce qu’il en avait marre du monde, une petite main est apparue devant lui. « Qu’est-ce que c’est ? » a demandé Dan Woohyun. « Une boulette ! » lui a été répondu. C’était la première fois de sa vie que quelqu’un était gentil avec lui sans aucune intention impure, et cela a changé son destin. Voici les chroniques d’un dieu martial qui a traversé mille ans de temps et d’espace !
description.ko:
그 누구도 맞설 수 없는 최흉의 인재(人災),

무극신마, 단우현.

이대로 영원히 세상위에 군림할 줄 알았다.
중원의 질서를 지키는 팔선들에 의해 동정호에 봉인을 당하기 전까지는….

세월이 흘러 천 년 후.
천 년이라는 시간은 단우현에게서 살심을 없애기에 충분했다.
변해버린 세상, 아는 사람이라고는 아무도 없는 고독, 남은 것은 허탈함과 공허함 뿐.

“바람이 흐르듯 세월도 흐르는구나. 정말로 아무것도 남은 것이 없어.”

목적도, 삶의 의지도 잃고 정처없이 떠도는 단우현 앞에 나타난 자그마한 소녀. 화소미.
누구에게도 기댈 곳 없어 보이는 소녀에게 단우현은 동질감을 느끼며 점점 마음의 문을 열기 시작한다.

“나는 단우현이다. 나와 함께 가자꾸나.”

얼음장 같은 마음을 가진 무신과 귀엽고 순수한 소녀의
마음을 따뜻하게 녹여 줄 평범하지 않은 한 가족의 중원 생활 이야기.

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lYB8b4SxrLo)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98%EB%A1%9D/2891)
description.zh: 因嗜杀被封印千年的武神苏醒归来，这一世，他却只想安安静静的养女儿...

title.en: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo wa Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.ja: クセ強彼女は床にいざなう
クセ強彼女はとこにいざなう
クセ強彼女は床(とこ)にいざなう

altTitles.ja-ro: Kusetsuyo Kanojo wa Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.en: A Quirky Girl Is Inviting Me to Bed

description.en:
***I'm suddenly living together with the older girl I used to have a crush on!? Even more, I'm starting to suspect that she's a slut!?***

Naoto Kiyoshi is a young man who just entered university after failing his entrance exams one year before. When he was looking for a place to live in so that he could move to Tokyo, he found himself living together with Luna, a relative and older girl who he used to have a crush on.

The Luna he admired in the past was neat, beautiful and mature... and now she apparently became a slut!? Night after night, he hears her seductive and unladylike moans, and it's making Naoto horny. There are also other men she's unreasonably close to besides him. Luna, whose thoughts he couldn't fathom, is leading him around by the nose! Furthermore, other women with lewd quirks aside from Luna have also gathered there!?

This is the start of his exciting new life surrounded by slutty(?) older girls!
description.ja:
昔好きだったお姉さんといきなり同棲!?しかもヤリマ●疑惑が浮上!?

一浪して大学に合格した青年・木吉直人。上京のために住める場所を探していたところ、親戚で憧れの姉・月（ルナ）の家で同棲することに。
昔憧れていた月は垢ぬけて、美しく成長し…そして…ビッチになっていた!?夜な夜なあられもない嬌声を聞き、モンモンとする直人。
他の男性がいる割に距離感もめちゃくちゃ近い。何を考えているか分からない月に翻弄され、さらに月以外の
エッチで癖が強い女の子たちも集まりだし…!?

ビッチ？なお姉さんたちに囲まれる楽しい新生活、開幕ーー。

title.en: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生だけどギャルにTSしました

altTitles.en: I’m a High School Boy, but I Got Gender-Swapped Into a Gyaru

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei Dakedo Gal ni TS Shimashita

description.en:
Shunpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! 
Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.

It's the beginning of an introverted high school guy => gender-swapped gyaru comedy!

---
- [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
description.ja:
陰キャ男子・桜井は、目の前で溺れていたギャル神様を助けた恩恵でギャルになってしまった。
母親の伝手で転校することができたが、その学校はギャルだらけの女子校だった！
ギャルどころか女子とまともに交流したことがない桜井にとって刺激が強すぎる毎日…。
陰キャ男子高校生⇒ギャルTSコメディ開幕！！

description.en:
Sangwoo, an average sophomore in college, always dreamt of having multiple versions of himself - one for study, another for play.

One day, he awakens with a skill called [Cloning], and Sangwoo thinks his dream has come true. But will cloning really steer his life in the direction he had hoped for, or does fate have other plans in store?

title.en: Global Freeze: I Created an Apocalypse Shelter

altTitles.zh: Quan Qiu Bing Feng: Wo Dazaole Mori Anquan Wu

altTitles.en: Freezing The World: I Built A Doomsday Safehouse

altTitles.zh: Quán Qiú Bīng Fēng: Wǒ Dǎzàole Mòrì Ānquán Wū

altTitles.en: The World Is Frozen: I Built a Doomsday Safe House

altTitles.zh: 全球冰封: 我打造了末日安全屋

description.en:
The world is plunged into an icy age, and 95% of humanity is wiped out! In his previous life, our hero Zhang Yi was tragically killed by the very people he helped, thanks to his kind heart.

But fear not, for Zhang Yi has been reborn and now possesses the awesome power – space manipulation! He's gone completely bonkers hoarding supplies for the icy apocalypse and is ready to rule the frozen wasteland! He vows to unleash a hundred times the pain on those who harmed him in the past!
description.pt-br: O mundo mergulhou numa era gelada e 95% da humanidade foi exterminada! Em sua vida anterior, nosso herói Zhang Yi foi tragicamente morto pelas mesmas pessoas que ajudou, graças ao seu bom coração. Mas não tema, pois Zhang Yi renasceu e agora possui o incrível poder de manipulação do espaço! Ele ficou completamente maluco acumulando suprimentos para o apocalipse gelado e está pronto para governar o deserto congelado! Ele promete desencadear cem vezes mais dor naqueles que o prejudicaram no passado!

title.en: I Am the Descendant of the Divine Dragon!

description.en: In the highly competitive world of the Xuan Realm Continent, where warriors strive to refine their bodies, cultivate their martial abilities, harness the essence of the heavens and earth, and push beyond mortal limitations, our protagonist, Lu Hao, faces unjust persecution from his own clan since childhood. However, fate smiles upon him as he awakens the dormant bloodline of the Divine Dragon within him. With an unyielding resolve, Lu Hao embarks on an extraordinary journey, overcoming countless obstacles to ascend to the zenith of power. Along the way, he unravels the enigmatic secrets of his past life.

altTitles.en: The best medical god in the city

description.en: "Five years ago, the Ye family was destroyed, and the trash Ye Chen disappeared mysteriously." Five years later, that Ye Family trash is back! He came back with a cultivating body that penetrated the heavens and the earth and cried, "Ghosts and gods!" This time, Ye Chen wants to make the sky fall in awe! Let the Earth tremble! To be in control of everything, to the top of the sky！”

Set in a world in which non-human, supernatural entities exist, mankind and in specific, Japanese society, is forced to reluctantly coexist as both sides are constantly vying for the right to live. Some of these entities are able to pass off as human, and do so peacefully. But there are also those who serve only to cause harm.

This story follows a young boy who survives a horrendous attack from one of those entities and is caught in a cycle of tragedy as a result.

altTitles.ja: タクトレ！

description.en:
Taku, a high school student, is depressed after being classified as on the verge of obesity. At an event he attended to heal his heartbreak, his favorite cosplayer, Shiramine Lil, asked him to do something for her. At Lil's request, he starts training at home!?
___
[Alt Official Raw (G's Channel)](https://gs-ch.com/articles/contents/arvDmbrh7s5vuLyhzc7MEpYJ)
description.pt-br: Taku, um estudante do ensino médio, está deprimido depois de ser diagnosticado com obesidade. Em um evento que ele participou para curar sua dor de cotovelo, uma mulher que ele gostava pediu para ele fazer algo… ele começa a treinar em casa!

title.en: The Sweet Life of a Reincarnation Pro

altTitles.en: Sweet Honey of the Reincarnated Pro

altTitles.ja: 転生のプロが甘い蜜を吸う方法

altTitles.en: How a Former Pro Takes Advantage by Doing an Easy Job

description.en:
This is his 101st reincarnation!
Is this life a fantasy again? Another fantasy? Just as he is disappointed, he hears his mother's mumbling.
He is the youngest prince with no inheritance rights?
No one pays attention to him?
Hooray! This life is a piece of cake.
He is tired of saving the world or fighting desperately for ambition.
What does he want?

Only to enjoy the sweet honey!

altTitles.en: Flowers I Pick to Give to You

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi ni Okuru Hana wo Tsumu
Sekai wa Futari de Dekite Iru

altTitles.ja: 人魚王子

description.en:
This volume is a collection of three short stories by Yoshihara Yuki.   
  
Ningyo Ouji  
Minako a hardworking office lady encountered a merman in the pond and was entranced by the beauty of his youth.  
(Also included in Yoshihara Yuki the Best Selection)  
  
Kimi ni Okuru Hana wo Tsumu  
Takuto died and left behind his girlfriend, Kaya, but several years later, Takuto comes back and possesses the body of her new boyfriend…  
  
Sekai wa Futari de Dekite Iru  
Youko is a succubus from hell and her rocket lands on the earth to feed off man's efforts. But one day, she met an ultra-refined priest and…  
(Also included in Yoshihara Yuki the Best Selection)
In a strange city, there is a clinic that will treat the victims of horrific diseases. For a price.

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

altTitles.ja: 笑顔のたえない職場です

altTitles.en: A Workplace Where You Can't Help But Smile

description.en: New shoujo manga artist Nana Futami works hard every day while being supported by Kaede Satou, her female editor who is older than her, and Mizuki Hazama, her assistant. According to the girl herself, she sometimes drums up intense daydream delusions of occupational illness! A working girls comedy set in the entertainment industry, brought to you by an author who always draws various girls.
description.ko: 신인 작가 후타미는 본인이 말하길 망상은 직업병! 이라며 담당 사토 씨와 어시스턴트 하 씨에게 도움을 받으면서 오늘도 열심히 일한다! 만화계에서 일하는 어른의 청춘군상극. 대상 독자는 만화를 사랑하는 모든 사람 입니다.

altTitles.ja: メドゥーサ奴隷を買った

description.en: I’m not sure why I decided to buy a medusa in the slave market, but since then she insists a lot that I remove the blindfold from her eyes. Is she trying to petrify me? Or does she really want to see me with her own eyes?
description.es-la:
No estoy seguro de por qué decidí comprar una medusa en el mercado de esclavos, pero desde entonces ella parece ser muy proactiva con su petición de que remueva la venda de sus ojos. 
¿Acaso busca petrificarme? ¿O de verdad quiere verme con sus propios ojos?
description.pt-br: Não tenho certeza de por que decidi comprar uma medusa no mercado de escravos, mas desde então ela insiste muito para que eu remova a venda de seus olhos. Ela está tentando me petrificar? Ou ela realmente quer me ver com seus próprios olhos?

title.en: Psycho x Past: Ryouki Satsujin Sennyuu Sousa

altTitles.en: Psycho x Past: Bizarre Murder Undercover Investigation

altTitles.ja: サイコ×パスト 猟奇殺人潜入捜査

description.en: The "psycho suspense" manga follows Godai, a policeman who was removed from the investigations division of the police due to violence toward criminals. He teams up with Hidaka, a man who is a self-proclaimed "paranormal police investigator" with claims to have the ability to send Godai in the past to prevent all the horrific crimes that happened, is that even possible and what will be the consequences?

South Korea is filled with various shitty laws.
The group of ‘juvenile kids’ that made my life into a living hell didn’t receive any punishment: these kids were the result of these shitty laws. I’ll now start my revenge.
description.kk:
Оңтүстік Корея әртүрлі заңдарға толы.
Менің өмірімді тозаққа айналдырған "жас балалар" тобы ешқандай жазаға тартылмады: бұл балалар осы заңдардың нәтижесі болды. Енді мен кек алуды бастаймын.
description.ko:
대한민국은 X같은 법들로 가득하다
나를 지옥으로 밀어넣고도 처벌받지 않았던 ‘촉법소년’들
그 X같은 법의 결과물들에게, 지금부터 복수를 시작한다
description.es-la: Corea del Sur está llena de leyes de mierda. El grupo de «menores» que convirtió mi vida en un infierno no recibió ningún castigo: esos menores fueron el resultado de esas leyes de mierda. Ahora comenzaré mi venganza. (Ocurre en el mismo universo de Lookism)
description.pt-br:
A Coreia do Sul está cheia de leis de merda.
E os ‘deliquentes’ que me empurraram para o inferno nunca foram punidos.
Então, está na hora de me vingar e passar por cima dessas leis de merda.

title.en: The Story of a High-Schooler Who Wanted a Girlfriend but Had a Sour Face

altTitles.ja-ro: Butchoudzuradakedo Kanojo ga Hoshii Koukousei no Hanashi

altTitles.ru: Старшеклассник с кислым лицом, что мечтал о девушке

altTitles.ja: 仏頂面だけど彼女が欲しい高校生の話

altTitles.en: The Story of a High-Schooler Who Wanted a Girlfriend but Had a Sour Face

description.en: A senpai with a sour expression and a kouhai who's a gloomy otaku like each other.

altTitles.en: The Youngest Son of a Conglomerate
The Youngest Son of a Chaebol Family

altTitles.ja: 財閥家の末息子

altTitles.th: รีบอร์นริช

altTitles.fr: Le plus jeune petit fils du conglomérat

description.en: Having started from the bottom and worked his way to the top, Hyeonwoo finds himself betrayed by the royal family of Soonyang Group, the largest corporation in South Korea, after providing 13 years of dedicated service. Just when he thinks all his efforts have been made in vain and prepares to embrace his death, he suddenly wakes up in the body of Dojun Jin, the youngest grandson to the founder and CEO of Soonyang, having traveled back in time. Having been granted this second chance, Hyeonwoo begins to lay the foundation for his revenge against his evil relatives.

altTitles.ja: Angel Beats! スピンオフ!!　旅する天使ちゃん

description.en: Kanade Tachibana is a cute girl who is called "Tenshi-chan" at school. She traveled all over the country in search of "someone". During her travels, when she stops by Kanagawa, she meets Yuri Nakamura, a lively and cheerful girl. People who look a lot like SSS members also appear on the road!? Will Angel be able to find "a certain person"...?
description.vi:
Đây là một spin-off của "Angel Beats!".

Tachibana Kanade là một cô gái xinh xắn được các bạn ở trường gọi là "Thiên sứ-chan". Cô đang du hành xuyên Nhật Bản để tìm kiếm "một ai đó". Dọc đường, khi đi ngang qua Kanagawa, cô gặp một cô nàng năng nổ và vui tính tên Nakamura Yuri.

Những người giống hệt các thành viên của chiến tuyến SSS cũng sẽ xuất hiện trong chuyến du hành của Thiên sứ-chan. Liệu cuối cùng cô sẽ có thể tao ngộ cùng "ai đó"?

description.en:
Federal Informant ‘Baek Yisu’ and a criminal gang’s boss, ‘Baek Dogyeong’ are twin brothers.

With the same faces the two twin brothers have lived different lives until now. Yisu, who’s been betrayed by the gang, throws away his identity to become his brother. This federal agent is soon to become the gang’s boss…!
description.pt-br: Os irmãos gêmeos Baek Yisoo, agente de inteligência da Hid e Baek Dohyeong, chefe de uma organização criminosa, viveram vidas diferentes mesmo com o mesmo rosto. Depois de ser traído pela organização o irmão mais novo decide abandonar sua identidade e se tornar o irmão mais velho. Um agente de inteligência torna-se chefe de uma organização criminosa…!

altTitles.ja: ごきげんよう、一局いかが？

altTitles.en: Good day to you, how about a game?

description.en: At a prestigious girls' school, Sae, a shy high schooler didn't fit in with her classmates. Her daily routine during lunch break consists of playing her Mahjong game on her phone. Due to her hobby being maybe too old-fashioned, she kept it a secret, until she was found out by her class' charismatic rich lady, Chise! Will they with their diametrically different personalities get along through playing Mahjong...?

title.en: Prince no Shukumei - Carramer no Yumemonogatari III

altTitles.en: Carramer no Yumemonogatari 3 - Prince no Shukumei
The Carramer Legacy 6 - The Marquis and the Mother-To-Be
カラメールの夢物語シリーズ
プリンスの宿命 カラメールの夢物語 3
プリンスの宿命 カラメールの夢物語 III

description.en:
Back in her lush, beloved Carramer, Carissa Day purchased the perfect Bed and Breakfast for raising her babies-to-be. Trouble was, an aristocratic "intruder" proved she'd been swindled – her new home was actually his royal lodge. Worse, he proved to be Carissa's teenage crush, Eduard de Marigny, Marquis of Merrisand – now more irresistible than ever.  
  
Penniless and pregnant – with triplets! – Carissa had to flee. Eduard, however, had other ideas. Namely, a partnership giving Carissa a title and protection – and giving him an instant heir. Still, even with reignited passion burning between them, even with a kingdom at her feet, could Carissa wed her first and only love – and forever forsake having his heart?  
  
'Carramer no Yumemonogatari' 3 and #6 of 'The Carramer Legacy' series.
Hyeun is a genius dancer but has stage fright, and Suhyun is a beginner dancer but is not afraid of the stage. This is the Street Dance growth story of two different dancers!
description.ko:
천재 댄서이지만 무대 공포증을 지닌 혜은과,
초보 댄서이지만 무대를 두려워하지 않는 수현.
서로 다른 두 댄서의 스트릿 댄스 성장기!

altTitles.ja: オーイ! とんぼ

description.en:
The story begins with Igarashi, who was disqualified as a pro golfer after a certain "incident" and thus moves to Kagoshima Prefecture's Tokara Islands to step out of the limelight. On these islands known as "Japan's last unexplored wilderness," he encounters a naive girl named Tonbo.

As it turns out, these supposedly unexplored islands have a homemade golf course, where Tonbo plays every day. She demonstrates genius-level prowess, playing every kind of shot with just one golf club, a 3-iron. Igarashi is amazed at Tonbo's talent, even as he harbors doubts about her only using a 3-iron. Yet, hidden deep in Tonbo's heart lies a painful, sad past….

Park Hyung-Seok is an unattractive loner who wakes up in a different body. Now tall, handsome, and cooler than ever in his new form, Hyung-Seok aims to achieve everything he couldn't before.

How far will he go to keep his body... and his secrets?
description.pt: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?
description.pt-br: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?

title.en: How to Survive as a Dragon with Time-Limit

altTitles.en: Survival Guide for a terminally-ill Dragon

description.en:
At the end of my terminally-ill life, I found myself reincarnated as a dragon in a webtoon. Once again, a life with a terminal illness, but this time, as a dragon?!

Lois, born with the heritage of the strongest creature in the world with wealth and thousands of years of lifespan as a dragon.

However, facing unpredictable crises at every turn, not knowing when I’ll die—what kind of Bullshit is this?!

It’s too unjust to just quietly die like this. Utilizing the future knowledge I have, I’ll survive like a villain and give this story a twist!

Do Janggon is a human weapon and former special forces spy against North Korea. When both of his arms got injured he was caught and brought to the ‘Daesan Welfare Center’, that abuses human rights and exploits labor. The doctor said it would take him a month to fully recover.

So he has to hold out in the welfare center until his arms are healed.

altTitles.ja: テンタクル・ホール

description.en: On the way home, Jin and his friend Komachi are suddenly transported to another world full of strange creatures and Jin is killed by them, but somehow manages to come back to life, but as a tentacled creature !? This is the start of a dark tentacle fantasy!
description.es: De camino a casa, Jin y su amiga Komachi son repentinamente transportados a otro mundo repleto de criaturas extrañas donde Jin muere a manos de estas, pero de alguna forma logra regresar a la vida… ¿¡pero como una criatura con tentáculos!? ¡El inicio de una fantasía oscura de tentáculos!
description.ja: 学校からの帰り道、いきなり異世界に飛ばされてしまった高校生・仁と幼馴染の小町。直後に巨大生物に襲われ命を落としてしまう仁だったが、なぜか触手生物に転生して――!? 淫悦触手ダークファンタジー、開幕。

description.en: 4-koma based on the mobile game Guns Girl Z (Houkai Gakuen / Houkai Gakuen 2).

title.en: Bishu no Daichi Fukushu ~Fukushuu no tame ni Kao wo Suteta Onna~

altTitles.ja: 美醜の大地～復讐のために顔を捨てた女～

altTitles.en: A Woman Who Abandoned Her Face for Revenge

altTitles.vi: Vì Hận Tái Sinh ~Người phụ nữ vì phục thù mà từ bỏ gương mặt của mình~

description.en:
A woman who was robbed of her family by bullying is reborn as another person, and she devotes herself to revenge from hell! , Because of her ugly appearance, she was badly bullied at a girls' school. The leader of bullying is Ayako Takashimazu, the daughter of a large company. Hana, who was accused of theft by her, was forced to leave school...!?

(from mangaupdates)
description.ja:
いじめによってすべてを奪われた女が別人に生まれ変わり、地獄の復讐に身を投じる！

昭和20年、太平洋戦争が終わりかけていた時代、樺太（からふと）で生まれ育った少女・市村ハナは、醜い容姿のため女学校で凄惨ないじめを受けていた。いじめのリーダー格は大会社の令嬢・高島津絢子。彼女によって泥棒の濡れ衣を着せられたハナは、退学に追い込まれてしまう。やがてソ連軍が空襲を開始し、樺太から北海道へ逃れる船に乗り込んだハナ一家だったが、いじめグループによって船から追い出されてしまい……。
description.vi:
Một cô gái với cuộc đời bị lấy đi tất cả mọi thứ do bị bắt nạt, vu oan đã tái sinh thành một người khác và cô quyết định trả thù tất cả những ai đã góp phần đẩy cuộc đời mình vào bước đường cùng!
Ichimura Hana, một cô gái sinh ra và lớn lên ở Karafuto, bị bắt nạt dã man tại một trường nữ sinh vì ngoại hình xấu xí của mình. Cầm đầu nhóm bắt nạt cô là Takashimazu Ayako, thiên kim tiểu thư của công ty sản xuất giấy lớn nhất Karafuto thời bấy giờ. Sau một lần bị vu cáo là kẻ trộm, Hana đã bị đuổi học.
Một thời gian sau, trong một cuộc di tản bởi trận không kích của quân Liên Xô, gia đình Hana đáng ra đã lên được một con tàu để thoát khỏi Karafuto đến Hokkaido, nhưng cả nhà cô đã bị xua đuổi khỏi tàu bởi chính sự vu cáo của bè lũ bắt nạt đó...

altTitles.fr: La Grande Jahy ne Perd Jamais

altTitles.en: The Great Jahy Will Not Be Defeated!

altTitles.ja: ジャヒー様はくじけない！

description.en:
Jahy-sama (pronounced jah-hee) is an existence to be feared and respected throughout the Demon Realm. Well, was.

The (former) Demon Realm No. 2 is now busy with house chores and work…in the human realm! Her dinner is just beansprouts, and she can't afford anything except water at cafes, but she won't get discouraged!

---
**Note:**
Jahy's shirt says '魔界復興', which seems to translate to 'Demon Realm Restoration'.
description.ru: Джахи-сама - существо, которое боялись и уважали во всем демоническом мире. Ну, когда-то... Вторая по силе (прежде) мира демонов теперь занята домашними заботами и работой... в человеческом мире! Её ужин - одна фасоль, а в кафе она не может себе позволить ничего кроме воды, но её никогда не сломить!

description.en:
On the day he was rejected by the company he had devoted his life to,
He went back to the moment of his first day at work. Kim Cheol-su, a low-spec rookie employee who joined Han-young, a leading domestic company. Can he finally achieve his long-desired position as the ‘CEO’ in this lifetime?

title.en: The Outcast Is Too Good at Martial Arts

altTitles.en: The Bullied One Is Too Good at Fighting

altTitles.es-la: El acosado es demasiado bueno luchando

description.en:
Martial artist Cha Moo-yeol falls for President Chang's manipulations and becomes a vegetable while competing in mixed martial arts. He is then used by the chairman as part of Jang's makeover. When he finally dies, he is possessed by the body of a high school student of the same name.
A hard body with S-class durability. A status bar ability that allows him to improve his martial arts skills, but this time it's different.
With his unfulfilled dream of becoming the strongest, he begins the fight for revenge against the president.
description.es-la:
El artista marcial Cha Moo-yeol cae en las manipulaciones del presidente Chang y se convierte en un vegetal mientras compite en artes marciales mixtas. Luego es utilizado por el presidente como parte de un cambio de imagen de Jang. Cuando finalmente muere, es poseído por el cuerpo de un estudiante de instituto del mismo nombre.
Un cuerpo duro con durabilidad de clase S. Una habilidad de barra de estado que le permite mejorar sus habilidades en artes marciales, pero esta vez es diferente.
Con su sueño incumplido de convertirse en el más fuerte, comienza la lucha por la venganza contra el presidente.

title.en: The Reincarnation of the Strongest Exorcist in Another World

altTitles.en: The Reincarnation of the Strongest Onmyoji ~ These Monsters Are Too Weak Compared to My Youkai~

altTitles.ja: 最強陰陽師の異世界転生記 ～下僕の妖怪どもに比べてモンスターが弱すぎるんだが～

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou Onmyouji no Isekai Tensei-ki ~Geboku no Youkai-domo ni Kurabete Monster ga Yowasugiru n da ga~

altTitles.zh-hk: 最強陰陽師的異世界轉生記 ～怪物比我的下僕妖怪弱太多了～

altTitles.zh: 最强阴阳师的异世界转生记

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou Onmyouji no Isekai Tenseiki ~Geboku no Youkaidomo ni Kurabete Monster ga Yowaisugirundaga~

description.en:
Haruyoshi Kuga’s power as the strongest exorcist is all for naught when he is betrayed by his closest ally. With his dying breath, he casts the secret Spell of Reincarnation — when he next opens his eyes, he finds himself in a different world altogether, reincarnated as Seika Lamprogue, the son of a family of magic scholars!

He quickly learns that the magic in this new world is quite unlike the sorcery he learned in his past life and that he can’t use it. Fortunately for him, with his mastery of curses and the hordes of youkai at his disposal, he doesn’t need to. 

Haruyoshi (now Seika) is determined not to repeat his past mistakes in his second life by smartly laying low and avoiding flaunting his power. Yet accomplishing his goals and without drawing attention to himself proves to be easier said than done — will his powers be enough to live a happy life?! 

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-reincarnation-of-the-strongest-exorcist-in-another-world)

altTitles.en: The Greatest Sect Leader of All-Time

description.en: All the members of my sect are abnormally strong. All my disciples turn out to be big shots, and I'll definitely become invincible in this world!
description.fr: Ma quête est de développer une secte qui serait un foyer chaleureux pour ses membres. Dedans, non seulement le chef de secte est amusant (ouais c'est moi) mais les disciples sont excentriques, aux personnalités très variées. Ils ont comme particularités d'être en constante évolution et d'être anormalement forts. Tous se révèlent être des gros bonnets, et moi, leur patriarche, je deviendrai invincible ! Approchez, les enfants, rejoignez ma secte et ensemble nous réaliserons vos rêves !

description.en: Kim SooHyun is an ordinary high schooler who isn’t good at studying, fighting, or being attractive. Suddenly, he’s faced with a quest window right in front of his eyes. After being given the powers of a game [system] out of nowhere, how will our hero confront the challenges ahead of him?
description.ko:
[외모지상주의], [싸움독학], [인생존망]과 세계관을 공유하는 박태준 유니버스 스핀오프 작품!
공부, 싸움, 외모.
뭐 하나 잘난 것 없는 평범한 고등학생 ‘김수현’의 눈앞에 갑자기 퀘스트창이 나타났다!
첫 번째 퀘스트, [엄마한테 사과하기]를 완료한 수현은 보상으로 키가 3cm 커지게 되는데!
퀘스트 엄청 쉽잖아?! 어떤 퀘스트든 완료해주마! 그런데 다음 퀘스트가?
[system] 학교 일진녀와 키스하십시오.
description.ru:
[Действие происходит в той же вселенной, что и «Лукизм» и «Как бороться (вирусный хит)»]

Ким Сухён – обычный старшеклассник. Он не очень хорош в учебе, борьбе и совсем не привлекателен. Внезапно прямо перед ним возникает окно квестов. Получив возможности игровой [Системы] из ниоткуда, как наш герой будет противостоять стоящим перед ним вызовам?
